product_name: REI Fleet Running Shorts - Men's 9" Inseam
long_description: The active fit and comfortable features of the REI Fleet running shorts will help you reach your fitness goals. Quick-drying and lightweight fabric delivers 4-way stretch and an extremely soft feel against skin. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Stretchy crepe liner briefs wick moisture away from body to keep you comfortable; fabric in liner shorts is recycled. Elastic waistband with drawcord fine-tunes the fit, and mesh waistband minimizes chafing and enhances dryness. 2 side pockets shelter hands, a sweat-resistant double lumbar pocket secures accessories with a zipper and stores nutrition with a mesh drop-in pocket. Internal pocket stores a key. Reflective highlights increase visibility in low light. The REI Fleet running shorts offer an active fit that supplies a full range of motion.
short_description: The active fit and comfortable features of the REI Fleet running shorts will help you reach your fitness goals.
